title: I was wondering if a "RED" could help me with a question.
body: So I remember it being said that there would be an additional reward for people who reached gold or higher in both flex que and solo standard. Is that still happening? What about hitting gold in 3v3?  Is there a super reward for hitting gold or higher in all 3?

replies.body: We don't have any details on this yet!  Stay tuned on our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page as we draw closer to the end of the season.
Really hope the 3v3 rewards are lit.
